para_sentences.para_0: O, Ω, and Θ notations help us define the efficiency of an algorithm and we can prove the correctness of algorithms using mathematical induction.

para_sentences.para_3: In question 3, you will use mathematical induction prove below non-recursive algorithm. (MLO3)
